name: airdrop_action_051
body: token :: mint_to (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . airdrop_dst_051 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"airdrop" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . airdrop_dst_051 . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . airdrop_src_051 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"airdrop" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount / 2 ,) ? ;

fields.name: airdrop_dst_051
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , token :: mint = mint , token :: authority = auth)]

fields.name: auth
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: PDA derived from static seed, vulnerable to sharing"] # [account (seeds = [b"airdrop"] , bump)]
